user_query: I'm organizing a company event and I need to fetch the latest order details for order ID 432. Additionally, I want to retrieve the user information for the username 'eventplanner'. Can you also provide me with the current status of the Numerology API?

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest order details for order ID 432.
Retrieve user information for the username 'eventplanner'.
Check the current status of the Numerology API.
